title: Accounting Director
job_overview:
World Tree (Upgrade to see actual info), a company headquartered in Southern California is in need of an accountant to handle day to day accounting functions.  Candidate must be Netsuite Certified or have extensive NetSuite experience.  Knowledge of posting inter-company journal entries and transactions is a must.

Responsibilities include:
Posting of all bank and credit card transactions.
A/P entry and payment execution.
Inventory reconciliation.
Equity reconciliation.
Processing payroll.
Processing employee reimbursements.
Cash flow management between entities.
Reconciliation of balance sheet accounts in monthly workpaper file.
Prep monthly financial statements for review.
Assist the CFO in general accounting and administrative functions.

**3 Prerequisites for Applying for This Position:**

1) 20 Apply Points minimum

2) ID Proof of 99%

3) Must complete Arithmetic, Attention to Detail, and Cognitive Ability assessments, achieving a 70% or better in each section:

Upgrade to see actual info

**If you meet the above 3 requirements, you have an extremely high likelihood of being offered the position.**
